title: Experience
text: I have experience as a clinical assistant, combining technical expertise with compassionate patient care. I have managed patient recruitment and screening for mental health studies, conducted detailed medical record reviews, and facilitated informed consent processes to ensure patient understanding and compliance. My earlier experiences include volunteering at community clinics, where I honed my skills in triaging patients, collecting medical histories, and administering treatments. I have a background in research and clinical environments reflecting my commitment to both technical precision and patient-centered care.

title: Education
text: I completed my undergraduate degree at Baylor University in Waco, TX from 2017-2021. Then I worked at the Interventional Pain and Recovery Center located in Houston, TX for about a year. I then moved onto my Masters in Science degree in Medical Physiology and Biophysics in Cleveland, OH. Excited to see where I go next!

title: Experience
text: I have worked extensively as a clinical assistant, combining technical expertise with compassionate patient care. My experience includes managing patient recruitment and screening for mental health research, conducting detailed medical record reviews, and guiding patients through informed consent processes. Before this, I volunteered at community clinics, where I honed my skills in triaging patients, collecting medical histories, and administering treatments. These experiences, combined with my research background, reflect my commitment to precise clinical practices and patient-centered care.
